name: Safe House
description:
· Original · Independent Production

A super long post apocalyptic visual novel with a focus on depression

· Over a hundred hours of creating screen recording files, independently creating 100000+word long scripts with multiple endings and lengthy scripts


· The game features a story of 14 main characters with group portraits, as well as over 30 top ranked characters. All characters have independent illustrations and voice acting. The author has created hundreds of character and background images, with thousands of failed renderings behind them.....


· 15 professional CV dubbing, with over 2000 dubbing files

· Hundreds of dialogue processing files

· 70+selected pieces from hundreds of CC0 music

· Looking forward to your visit!
